abstract: Karma al-Khayat, executive for Al Jadeed TV in Lebanon, is fined by international tribunal for contempt of court relating to program that exposed witnesses in investigation of 2005 murder of former Prime Min Rafik Hariri.
lead_paragraph: Karma al-Khayat, an executive with Al Jadeed TV in Lebanon, was fined 10,000 euros — more than $11,000 — for contempt of court.

headline.main: Lebanon: TV Executive Is Fined in Case Tied to Hariri Tribunal
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Lebanon: TV Executive Is Fined in Case Tied to Hariri Tribunal

snippet: Karma al-Khayat, an executive with Al Jadeed TV in Lebanon, was fined 10,000 euros — more than $11,000 — for contempt of court.
